item.title: Automate Kali Linux Updates with This Handy Shell Script
item.description: Keeping your Kali Linux system up-to-date is crucial for security, stability, and access to the latest tools. Instead of manually running apt update and apt upgrade every time, why not automate the process with a shell script?
